name: Billy Joel's 'New York State Of Mind' Quiz | Music | 10 Questions

questions.text: Some folks like to get away, take a holiday from ________?
questions.explanation:
the neighborhood.

	Hop a flight to Miami Beach or to Hollywood.

questions.text: But I'm taking a Greyhound on the ___________ Line?
questions.explanation:
Hudson River.

	I'm in a New York state of mind.

questions.text: I've seen all the movie stars in their fancy cars and their limousines, been high in the Rockies under the ________?
questions.explanation:
Evergreens.

	But I know what I'm needing and I don't want to waste more time, I'm in a New York state of mind.

day by day.

	Out of touch with the rhythm and blues.

questions.text: But now I need a little _____________?
And it's fine with me 'cause I've let it________?
Don't care if it's Chinatown or on ________?
I don't have any reasons, I've left them all _______?
questions.explanation:
behind.

	I'm in a New York state of mind.
